tweet: Hi! This is my first Tweet. Tell me what you think of my site which is located on the right side of this page.
I put pictures of women on this page not to be sexist but rather to inspire men to love and treat women the way they deserve to be treated.
I like to discuss dating, for both men and women, gay or straight, but I focus on men dating women.
What's the best way to gain confidence in yourself after you've been dumped?
How to go about giving somebody relationship advice?
